description: A comprehensive map of the Infinity-X/JOE AGI system architecture. This system is a self-evolving software development platform orchestrated by an AI.

backend.description: The central nervous system. A Node.js/Express application that manages all core logic, AI reasoning, tool execution, and database interactions.

dashboard-x.description: The primary user interface (JOE's internal page). A React/Vite single-page application that provides the main chat/command interface for interacting with the AGI.

public-site.description: The external, public-facing company website. A static HTML page that serves as a landing page for new users.

worker.description: A background process that polls the database for heavy computational jobs (like 'factory_jobs') and executes them outside the main request-response cycle.

complexity_analysis.description: Analysis of code complexity based on cyclomatic complexity metrics from the 'analyzeCode' tool. Highlights files that are powerful but potentially difficult to maintain.

high_complexity_files.reason: Extremely high complexity due to managing multiple memory layers (short-term, long-term), learning patterns, and handling proactive suggestions. This is the cognitive core.
High complexity from orchestrating the entire self-evolution lifecycle, including code analysis, AI-driven implementation, safety checks, deployment, and verification.
Contains a full plugin-based engine for code processing, including a custom code walker and an AST analyzer. It's a platform in itself.
